contentList.content: Usable once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> or once per <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Wildshape_Panther">Wild Shape</LSTag>.
You are considered <LSTagTooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with this weapon while wielding it.
Spew forth a column of acid.
Spew forth a column of lightning.

Targets hit with this weapon must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SILENCED">Silenced</LSTag> for 2 turns.

When attacking with a glaive, halberd, pike, quarterstaff, or spear, you can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of your weapon.

You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.
